metadata.title: CVE-2022-23303 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
The implementations of SAE in hostapd before 2.10 and wpa_supplicant before2.10 are vulnerable to side channel attacks as a result of cache accesspatterns. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2019-9494.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

eapoltest - 2:2.10-21
hostapd - 2:2.10-21
wpagui - 2:2.10-21
wpasupplicant - 2:2.10-21
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.10-21').
